description:
Road-bike fenders that fend off water, mud, and attachment hassles. After a one-time installation, they clip on and off in a jiffy, so you can keep moving.

  • 25 mm wide fenders fits road tires
  • End of each mudguard extends to below the hub axles to prevent splashing
  • Adjustable stays ensure a proper fit with your wheels
  • Can be clipped on and off in seconds
  • Brackets attach at brake bolts and skewers
  • Each fender has 2 parts. Front are 52.5cm and 15cm, rear are 80.5cm and 15cm
  • Maximum recommended tire width is 25mm
name: SKS Raceblade Long Fender Set (700x18-25)
